title: LF DIAMOND+ Dynamic queue partners - Duo/Trio/Quad
body:
Hey, looking for confident diamond+ players who have a positive mindset when entering a new game including from champ select. Comms are essential but not required, a good game sense is all that is needed to win. I'm looking for people who are down to commit to around 4+ games on a regular basis of dynamic queue! 

My roles - Mid/Supp/Top
Goal - Diamond 2+

IGN: O B B 1 E

replies.body:
hey im plat was diamond last season looking for duos aswell to climb back to the top add me if you want a friend :)
IGN: Dad Ganked Mum
Hi, I was Diamond last season and finished Plat 2 after placements this season, haven't played since. Also Looking for queue partners. Can play any role. IGN: Zebra.  Thanks.
i am bronze but i deserve challenger
